overview: Olga is a young Sami girl at the Kola Peninsula in Northwest-Russia.  Everyone believes she is mentally retarded because she has grown up in an orphanage. Turning 18, she is being sent home and rejected by her own people. But Olga is a talented teenager and a gifted storyteller. The film takes us along Olgaâ€™s road in her claim for dignity and cultural identity.
tagline: Dignity comes and goes, but friends never return, once lost.
title: Olga - til mine venner
